ScenarioDef.label: The Messiah
ScenarioDef.description:
You were an unremarkable genie scientist working a grueling 9 - 5 in the Imperial ship labs when an accident with an experimental gravcore caused a resonance cascade and knocked you unconcious. You felt the changes before you saw them; your muscles engorged, your wings glorious, and your aura impecable. You had been transformed into an angelic being like the old earth myths.

But you weren't in the lab anymore, you were on some primitive medieval outer rim planet. And the people, by the stellarch the people, gasping and screaming; not in terror, but in wonderment. Many started calling you Messiah, and bowing to you, still slumped in the dirt.

My god, they think I'm a real living, breathing, angel.

scenario.summary: A science experiment gone wrong transports you to a magical fantasy world.

li.customSummary: Start with one Seraph and two loyal and worshipful followers.

li.text: You have been whisked away to a distant fantasy world, and in the process, transformed into an angelic being, like something from the tales of old Earth. Now wherever you go more and more followers seem to join your cause, whatever it happens to be!
